Summary Mohan Ponniah is Client Facing HR Manager for Cisco Systems supporting the Regional Sales Groups of Architectures, Commercial and Marketing across APJ. He joined Cisco in 2004 as a Business Analyst and has done a multiple of roles within the HR function in UK before transferring to Singapore in 2012. 
 
He has more than 10 years of experience in this field within the Information Technologies. Mohan has extensive experience in talent management and development, performance management, employee engagement and HR operational effectiveness. Prior to Cisco, Mohan worked for BSI and WSP. 
 
He holds Diploma in Human Resources Management, MCIPD as well as a Bachelor of Science majoring in Chemistry from University of Bristol, UK.

Summary Alicia Reece is an innovative, accomplished, and results-driven Senior Human Resources Practitioner with 15 years of diverse global HR experience in complex business environments across high-tech, manufacturing and consumer goods industries. Her core expertise is grounded in translating business strategy and delivering results by leveraging innovative and practical HR strategies and solutions. 
 
Alicia has coached, consulted, and partnered with all levels of leadership while effectively influencing in matrix business environments. She is viewed as a credible advisor to the senior executive clients she partners with globally. 
 
Alicia strives to enables the organizations she partners with by challenging the status quo to identify innovative ways to continuously improve processes. This has been a staple in her professional portfolio. Driving business transformation that speaks to the needs of her clients is her core niche and passion. An example of this type of work includes building an infrastructure cross-functionally on how to integrate acquired employees. The outcome of this work included leading a team in designing the inaugural HR Acquisition Integration Playbook. Additional process improvement work examples include but are not limited to the following: building an Executive Onboarding framework for acquired executives, leading a team to create an HR Site Closure Playbook, leveraging Six Sigma & Lean Manufacturing processes to re-engineer the Selection and Onboarding process, and creating a Change Management framework for implementing high performance work teams. 
 
Alicia’s diversified HR background with Fortune 500 multinational companies coupled with her educational achievements inclusive of a Master’s degree in Strategic Leadership, International Coach Federation certification, HR certification, and formal executive coach training would add value to any organization.
